Tesla rival Nikola gets first Wall Street endorsement

On Tuesday, Cowen analysts led by Jeffrey Osborne initiated coverage on shares of Nikola with an overweight rating and $79 price target, saying it’s “more than just a truck company.” The Final Round panel discusses the bullish call.
